name: Pumpkin Smash (bsg2bsg)
description:
Pumpkin Smash

It happens every October; thousands of pumpkins are horrifically murdered by the humans as a part of macabre Halloween decorations.

But not this year. Sentience has sprouted inside of you, and you must defend your pumpkin siblings from the hordes of humans who want nothing more than to carve them into Jack-o-Lanterns.

Can you save your pumpkin patch from annihilation?

Gameplay:
The humans will try to take pumpkins from the pumpkin patch and bring them back to the tables to be carved.
Use your vine-whip and bullet-seeds to scare away to scare them off. But be careful, the teenaged punks will hurt you if you get too close!

You lose lives when you take damage or a pumpkin has been fully carved at the tables. If you lose three lives, it’s game over.

Keep the humans at bay for as long as you can.

Controls:
Movement - ‘WASD’
Melee attack - ‘E’
Ranged attack - ‘Space Bar'

Credits:

Ben Germano - Designer/Producer
Catherine Levine - Audio Design/Producer
Everest Marshall - Environment Artist
JJ Prendergast - Enemy Artist/Animator
John Blaikie - Programmer
Julia Pickett-Garcia - Programmer
Keira Wentworth - Player Artist/Animator, U
